data.route_analysis: Major transport routes include international airports and high-speed rail. Consider direct flights for quick access.
data.seasonal_patterns: January - February: Winter sports; March - May: Spring festivals; June - August: Beach tourism; September - November: Autumn leaf viewing.
data.climate: Warm summers with average temperatures of 25°C - 30°C, and cold winters with snow. Ideal for beach and winter activities respectively.
data.culture: Rich cultural heritage including festivals, local arts, and cuisine. Major events include summer beach festivals and winter fairs.
data.attractions: Top attractions include historical sites, natural parks, and vibrant markets.
